Item.name: Nuclear Depth Charge Proximity Decoy Shell
Double Chaingun
Item.description: A monstrous, double-mounted 'Decimator' pattern chaingun, offering twice the firepower of a chaingun in a not-so-compact package. Capable of tearing entire swarms of targets to shreds and powering through all but the absolute thickest of armors through raw force alone, let down only by it's awful accuracy and lengthy chargeup time.

Item.name: Depth charge mortar
Item.description: An archaic predecessor of the modern Railgun, the Depth Charge Mortar utilizes small combustion charges in order to propel massive variable-payload depth charges over far longer distances than can be achieved through simply plopping them through a depth tube. Great for use against massive swarms of targets thanks to charge's massive area of effect, and also holds notable utility through the use of decoy charges, but lacks the follow-through and effectiveness against single, agile targets that the railgun holds.

Item.name: Rupture Gun
Item.description: A rather cheap, compact turret when compared to most traditional options. The so-called 'Rupture Gun' was designed as an interior defensive weapon, though it's water-proofing still allows it to be utilized as a cheap, easy-to-operate external weapon, effective mostly against soft unarmored targets and virtually useless against those with thick shells or armor, unless specailized munitions are used.

Item.name: Rupture Bolt Drum
Item.description: A compact rotary drum of belted cast-iron cased lead-core frangible munitions, which have nigh-on no penetrative power but deal devastating bleeding damage against soft targets, making them optimal for interior sentry use. Contains up to 200 slugs. Unlike traditional ammo boxes, these are compact enough to theoretically shove into a backpack.

Item.name: Rupture 'Penetrator' Bolt Drum
Item.description: Cased in aluminium with a solid steel core, these so-called 'frag' bolts lose their optimability for interior use in favor of having increased penetration and effectiveness against armored targets. Contains up to 150 slugs.

Item.name: thgpulselaserbolt1
Item.description: Utilizing the power of Thorium, these pulse laser diodes have been overclocked in order to allow for more charges to be eeked from each capacitor. The increased ampage of the laser diodes also lends toward increased stun and penetration on impact, though it's raw damage output is roughly the same.

Item.name: Overclocked Pulse Laser Fuel Box
Item.description: High-capacity Pulse Laser capacitance charges, boasting a longer life than normal charges with slightly increased yield, and a notably more potent stunning effect.

Item.name: thgpulselaserbolt2
Item.description: Utilizing the power of Thorium, these pulse laser diodes have been overclocked in order to allow for more charges to be eeked from each capacitor. The increased ampage of the laser diodes also lends toward increased stun and penetration on impact, though it's raw damage output is roughly the same.

Item.name: Explosive Chaingun Ammo Box
Item.description: A box of jacketed low-caliber explosive micromunitions for the Chaingun. Relatively low-yield, but offer a far larger radius of effect than standard munitions, making for devastating effectiveness when employed en masse. Half the capacity of a standard chaingun box.

Item.name: Destabilized Pulse Laser Fuel Box
Item.description: Destabilized, high-wattage radioactive pulse laser capcitance charges fueled by a highly unstable blend of thorium and uranium. The capacitance cores burn out much more quickly when compared to traditional cells, but offer violent explosive discharges which, while slighlty less concentrated than standard pulse shots, offer a wider area of effect combined with a minorly irradiating qualities.

Item.name: Rupture Gun 'Spreadshot' Drum
Item.description: A compact rotary drum of belted shells filled with soft lead buckshot, which spalls and fragments nigh-on harmlessly against hard targets such as hull. Highly optimal for interior sub defense due to it's wide spread and huge damage potential in close quarters, though the rounds are virtually useless against hardened targets, especially at long range.

Item.name: Pulse Macrolaser
Item.description: A monstrous dual-mounted 'Ruinarch' pattern pulse laser. Capable of laying out more than twice the firepower of it's smaller brother, though very power hungry and expensive to operate due to it's high ammo consumption.
